mapper.insert: INSERT INTO admin_report (report_id, fno, reason, content, report_date, writer) VALUES (admin_report_seq.NEXTVAL, #{fno}, #{reason}, #{content}, #{reportDate}, #{writer})
mapper.select:
SELECT report_id AS reportId, fno, writer, reason, content, report_date AS reportDate
FROM admin_report WHERE report_id = #{reportId}

SELECT report_id AS reportId, fno, writer, reason, content, report_date AS reportDate
FROM admin_report ORDER BY report_date DESC
